Actions.Name: Biotic
Actions.Effects: On hit, foe is shattered and poisoned. Shatters foe even on miss if they are poisoned.

Actions.Name: Deluge
Actions.Description: The beast dashes 2, then deals 2 piercing damage to a foe in range 6.

Actions.Name: Blight Lob
Actions.Description: The Beast creates a blast 1 area of difficult terrain. Characters standing in the area are vulnerable+. The area lasts for the rest of combat, or until this beast uses this ability again.
